name: Parsnip
description: A humble root vegetable, mild in flavor and a good early-game crop.

name: Cauliflower
description: A large, white floweret that takes some time to grow, but sells for a good price.

name: Potato
description: A starchy tuber, versatile for cooking and a reliable staple crop.

name: Wheat
description: A common grain, essential for baking and animal feed. Can be harvested in bulk.

name: Blueberry
description: Small, sweet berries that are a summer delight and regrow multiple times.

name: Tomato
description: A juicy, red fruit often used as a vegetable in cooking. Continues to produce after first harvest.

name: Hot Pepper
description: A fiery pepper that adds a kick to any dish. Regrows frequently once mature.

name: Melon
description: A large, sweet fruit, perfect for a hot summer day. Sells for a high price.

name: Cranberry
description: Tart, red berries that are popular in the fall. Produces a large yield per plant.

name: Pumpkin
description: A festive gourd, great for decoration or delicious pies. Very profitable in the fall.

name: Grape
description: Sweet, juicy berries that grow in bunches. Can be used for wine or eaten fresh.
